statements: SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT order_id, customer_name FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY total_amount ASC
SELECT order_id, customer_name, total_amount FROM orders
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT order_id, customer_name FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY order_id
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM orders
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_name='John Doe';
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_id ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_id=1;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE status='delivered';
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, estimated_delivery_date FROM shipments WHERE estimated_delivery_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY estimated_delivery_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM orders JOIN shipments ON orders.order_id = shipments.order_id WHERE status='processing';
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM Shipments ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, status FROM Shipments WHERE status = 'shipped';
SELECT history_id, description FROM ShipmentHistory ORDER BY status_change_date ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_id, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, customer_id FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 12345 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE customer_id IN (5678, 9876) ORDER BY total_amount ASC, order_date DESC;

SELECT s.shipment_id, s.shipment_date, sh.status_change_date FROM Shipments s INNER JOIN ShipmentHistory sh ON s.shipment_id = sh.shipment_id WHERE s.status = 'delivered' ORDER BY s.shipment_date ASC, sh.status_change_date ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date, order_status FROM orders;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, shipping_address FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT agent_name, agent_phone, agent_email, agent_location FROM delivery_agents;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_status FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM shipments JOIN orders ON shipments.order_id = orders.order_id WHERE shipment_status = 'In transit';
SELECT agent_name, agent_phone, agent_email FROM delivery_agents WHERE agent_location LIKE '%York%';
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE status='pending';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT MAX(stock_quantity) AS max_stock FROM products;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date, status FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_status = 'In Transit' AND expected_delivery_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT shipment_id, location FROM tracking WHERE status = 'Delayed' ORDER BY shipment_id ASC;
